content: this is a nice wide ear warmer the texture is obtained by using several techniques half_double_crochet in third loop /camel stitch front post/back post half_double_crochet and front post/back post double_crochet i would set this skill level at advanced beginner/intermediate this pattern includes a photo tutorial for the third loop/camel stitch and links to video tutorials for the fp/bp half_double_crochet and fp/bp double_crochet the pattern is for a pre-teen teen/adult xl this ear warmer works up quickly and can easily be customized with color changes for stripes so far i have worked this pattern with i love this yarn from hobby lobby i am available for any questions you may have i hope you enjoy this pattern
